body.p: In addition the standard maven goals, the following goals have been defined.

tr.td: Builds war and jar files in the correct order for each subproject, including the portlet applications. After each war or jar is build, it is coppied to the local maven repository.
Cleans all subprojects and the root project.
See the allSite goals in the Site subproject
Builds the site for each subproject and updates the subproject list on the navigation bar. This calls the "subSite" and "site" goals.
Builds the site for each subproject, excluding the "site" subproject, and updates the subproject list on the navigation bar.
